keyPolicies.policyDescription: Wants to make Morecambe great again, which starts with long term investment. Impact on local businesses is mentioned along with stopping parking charges in Morecambe Town Centre.
Focus on Morecambe being a seaside resort, bringing the crowds back to Morecambe all year round, including better Christmas lights to welcome visitors.
Overdue repairs to the roads and pavements are proposed.
Discusses providing social housing that is affordable for local people and veterans, and improving welfare cuts and care home funding.
Addresses the issues of public Library's only being kept open due to community help and people being stranded in rural areas due to bus route closures.

mentions.candidate: UKIP's candidate for Morecambe and Lunesdale

issues.economy: Stopping parking charges in Morecambe Town Centre, long term investment to improve local business.
issues.socialWelfare: Stopping welfare cuts, better feeling about the future.

housing.content: Providing social housing that is affordable for local people & veterans
